Features.Grinding.StickyMouseButton.Desc: When active, the user will not need to keep the right-mouse button held down to keep the quern active.
Features.Grinding.SpeedMultiplier.Descri: Change the speed at which the player grinds resources within a quern. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.0, Max: 10.0, Default: 1.0.
Features.Grinding.IncludeAutomated.Descr: Apply the speed multiplier to automated querns, as well as manual querns.
Features.Grinding.ModMenu.lblDescription: Provides an easier way for players to grind resources in a quern.
Features.Grinding.ModMenu.lblSpeedMultip: Determines the multiplier to apply to the speed of using the quern
Features.Grinding.ModMenu.lbIncludeAutom: Determines whether to apply the speed multiplier to automated querns
Features.Grinding.ModMenu.lbStickyMouseB: When active, the user will not need to keep the right-mouse button held down to keep the quern active
